Park City Family Activities

Year-Round Adventures for Kids and Adults - Create Lasting Memories

Top Family Attractions

Park City is a wonderland for families, offering year-round activities that thrill both kids and adults. From Olympic facilities to alpine slides, there's something magical for every age.

Utah Olympic Park

Home of the 2002 Winter Olympics with thrilling activities, museums, and shows. Watch ski jumpers train and try the zipline or ropes course.

  • Ages: All ages welcome
  • Zipline and adventure course
  • Olympic museum and tours
  • Flying Ace All-Stars shows
  • Year-round activities

Park City Mountain Resort

Summer activities include alpine slides, mountain coaster, ziplines, and scenic chairlift rides. Winter brings world-class skiing and snowboarding.

  • Ages: All ages welcome
  • Alpine slide and mountain coaster
  • Scenic chairlift rides
  • Activity passes available
  • Seasonal mountain adventures

Deer Valley Resort

Family-friendly ski resort with excellent beginner terrain. Summer activities include mountain biking, hiking, and scenic chairlift rides.

  • Ages: All ages welcome
  • Sterling Express scenic lift
  • Family ski programs
  • Summer mountain biking
  • Lift tickets required for activities

Park City Museum

Interactive exhibits about Park City's mining history. Kids love the territorial jail and mining equipment displays.

  • Ages: 5+ (best for school age)
  • Interactive mining exhibits
  • Historic jail experience
  • Educational programs
  • Admission: $10 adults, $5 kids

Swaner Preserve & EcoCenter

Nature preserve with wildlife viewing, hiking trails, and environmental education programs. Great for nature-loving families.

  • Ages: All ages welcome
  • Free admission
  • Boardwalk nature trails
  • Wildlife viewing opportunities
  • Environmental education programs

Gorgoza Park

Tubing hill with magic carpet lift and night tubing. Perfect for families who want snow fun without skiing.

  • Ages: 3+ (with adult supervision)
  • Winter tubing only
  • Magic carpet lift system
  • Night tubing sessions
  • Pricing: $25-35 per session

Summer Family Activities

Adventure Activities

  • Alpine Slide: Thrilling gravity-powered mountain ride
  • Mountain Coaster: Year-round roller coaster through trees
  • Ziplines: Soar through the forest canopy
  • Scenic Chairlifts: Easy mountain views for all ages
  • Hiking Trails: Family-friendly paths with stunning views

Water Activities

  • Jordanelle Reservoir: Swimming, paddleboarding, beach
  • Rockport Lake: Fishing, boating, camping
  • Provo River: Gentle tubing and rafting
  • Hotel Pools: Many resorts offer day passes
  • Splash Pads: Free water play areas in town

Outdoor Exploration

  • McPolin Farm: Easy nature trail with historic barn
  • Trailside Park: Paved paths with playground stops
  • City Park: Playground and picnic areas
  • Disc Golf: Free course at Creekside Park
  • Geocaching: Modern treasure hunting in the mountains

Winter Family Adventures

Skiing & Snowboarding

Both resorts offer excellent ski schools and beginner terrain. Kids as young as 3 can learn to ski!

  • Ski schools for ages 3 and up
  • Magic carpet beginner lifts
  • All-day childcare available
  • Equipment rentals on-site
  • Family-friendly terrain and programs

Tubing & Sledding

Gorgoza Park and other locations offer safe tubing fun for the whole family.

  • Gorgoza Park tubing hill
  • City Park sledding areas
  • Magic carpet lift systems
  • Night tubing sessions available
  • Equipment rental included

Ice Skating & Hockey

Outdoor ice rinks and the Eccles Ice Arena offer skating fun for all skill levels.

  • Outdoor rinks downtown Park City
  • Eccles Ice Arena facilities
  • Skate rentals available on-site
  • Learn-to-skate programs offered
  • Family skating sessions

Snowshoeing

Easy winter hiking perfect for families. Many trails are accessible right from town.

  • Guided family tours available
  • Equipment rentals and instruction
  • Round Valley trail system
  • Full moon guided tours
  • All skill levels welcome

Winter Festivals & Events

Special winter events designed for families, including holiday celebrations and snow activities.

  • Holiday parades and celebrations
  • Snow sculpture contests
  • Ice carving demonstrations
  • Winter carnival activities
  • Family-friendly festivals

Indoor Winter Activities

Perfect for stormy days or when you need a break from the cold weather.

  • Museums and interactive exhibits
  • Movie theaters with current films
  • Indoor climbing walls
  • Bowling alleys and game centers
  • Libraries with story times

Activities by Age Group

Toddlers (Ages 2-4)

  • City Park playground equipment
  • Swaner Preserve easy nature trails
  • Park Silly Sunday Market
  • Resort kid zones and activities
  • Gentle chairlift rides with parents
  • Summer splash pads for water play

Kids (Ages 5-12)

  • Alpine slides and mountain coasters
  • Ski and snowboard lessons
  • Utah Olympic Park activities
  • Tubing at Gorgoza Park
  • Downtown treasure hunts
  • Junior ranger programs

Teens (Ages 13+)

  • Zipline adventures and ropes courses
  • Mountain biking trail systems
  • Rock climbing walls and outdoor climbing
  • Extreme sports at Olympic Park
  • Skateboard and BMX parks
  • Photography and nature tours

Educational & Cultural Experiences

Museums & Learning

  • Park City Museum: Interactive mining history
  • Utah Olympic Park Museum: Olympic sports history
  • Swaner EcoCenter: Environmental education
  • Kimball Art Center: Kids' art workshops
  • Egyptian Theatre: Family-friendly performances

Cultural Programs

  • Junior Ranger Programs: Nature education
  • Kids' Theater: Drama classes and productions
  • Music Lessons: Local instructors and programs
  • Art Classes: Painting, pottery, and crafts
  • History Tours: Kid-friendly walking tours

Nature Programs

  • Wildlife Tracking: Learn animal signs
  • Wildflower Walks: Seasonal nature tours
  • Astronomy Programs: Dark sky viewing
  • Geocaching: Modern treasure hunting
  • Photography Classes: Capture mountain beauty

Family-Friendly Dining

Kid-Friendly Restaurants

  • Squatters: Kids menu and outdoor patio
  • Wasatch Brewpub: Family-friendly atmosphere
  • Eating Establishment: Breakfast served all day
  • Windy Ridge Cafe: Outdoor seating areas
  • Purple Sage: Western theme at Canyons

Quick & Casual Options

  • Freshies: Healthy fast food options
  • Cafe Rio: Mexican family-style dining
  • Five Guys: Burgers and fresh-cut fries
  • Subway: Build-your-own sandwiches
  • Pizza chains: Multiple locations in town

Sweet Treats

  • Java Cow: Ice cream and coffee combo
  • Cake Boutique: Cupcakes and desserts
  • Rocky Mountain Chocolate: Candy treats
  • Dolly's Bookstore: Books and sweet treats
  • Local gelato shops: Artisan frozen treats

Safety & Family Tips

High Altitude Considerations

  • Park City elevation: 7,000 feet above sea level
  • Drink lots of water and stay hydrated
  • Use sunscreen - UV rays are stronger
  • Take breaks more frequently than usual
  • Watch for altitude sickness symptoms

Winter Safety

  • Dress in layers - weather changes quickly
  • Always wear helmets when skiing/snowboarding
  • Check weather conditions before heading out
  • Stay on marked trails and designated areas
  • Have emergency contacts and ski patrol numbers

Summer Safety

  • Mountain weather changes rapidly
  • Carry extra water and snacks
  • Watch for afternoon thunderstorms
  • Wildlife awareness in natural areas
  • Sun protection essential at high altitude

Budget-Friendly Family Fun

Free Activities

  • Free Transit: Ride buses to explore areas
  • City Park: Playground, picnic areas, events
  • Hiking Trails: Many free family-friendly options
  • Park Silly Sunday Market: Free entertainment
  • Swaner Preserve: Free nature center and trails

Low-Cost Options

  • Library Programs: Story times and activities
  • Gallery Walks: Free art viewing experiences
  • Outdoor Ice Skating: Free at outdoor rinks
  • Seasonal Events: Many free festivals and parades
  • Beach Days: Jordanelle State Park entry fee

Money-Saving Tips

  • Look for family package deals
  • Check for kids-free promotions
  • Pack lunches for day adventures
  • Use free shuttle transportation
  • Take advantage of hotel amenities
